[![The Excepgen Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955ccec99c7e1b_ExcepGen%20Logo.svg)](http://www.excepgen.com/</>)
# Unlocking nucleic acid medicines
Gene therapies and vaccines powered by a new generation of DNA and mRNA
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955c808e9c7e1e_down-arrow.svg)](http://www.excepgen.com/<#intro>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955c37dd9c7e1d_top.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955c099c9c7e1c_home-bottom-img.png)
# A dynamic biological challenge
Nucleic acid therapeutics have come a long way since their first use in preclinical experiments. Major advances in capping, delivery, manufacturing, and non-natural nucleosides enabled the field to grow. These solutions, while game-changing, have all focused on engineering the chemistry and delivery of nucleic acids. 
# A dynamic biological solution
ExcepGen addresses the cellular response to nucleic acids. Our platform alters the way that cells respond to DNA and mRNA by dampening undesirable pathways.
# Core initiatives
Preventative and Therapeutic Vaccines
Rare Diseases
Gene Therapy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955c54e09c7e37_initiatives%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955cf47b9c7e38_Frame%2066%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290a0f136955cc0409c7dc0/6290a0f136955ce08a9c7e33_initiatives-mobile.jpg)
# The team behind it
We're a team of visionary scientists unwilling to accept the status quo. Our drive to improve human health wakes us up and motivates our research. We believe that by exploring foundational principles of biology, we can make the greatest impact on human life.
[More About The Team](http://www.excepgen.com/</team>)[Join Us](http://www.excepgen.com/</careers>)

generated_description:
**Excepgen Overview: A Summit of Science and Innovation**

Welcome to Excepgen, a bold biotechnology startup nestled in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco. This company, part of Y Combinator's Winter 2019 batch, is on a mission to revolutionize nucleic acid medicines, focusing on gene therapies and vaccines powered by cutting-edge DNA and mRNA technologies.

### What They Do
At Excepgen, the primary aim is not merely to improve how gene therapies are delivered, but to fundamentally alter how cells respond to these therapies. The team is tackling some significant biological challenges by dampening undesirable cellular pathways that can hinder therapeutic effectiveness. Their core initiatives target:

- **Preventative and Therapeutic Vaccines**
- **Rare Diseases**
- **Gene Therapy**

### The Team Behind It
Excepgen boasts a small yet powerful team of three visionary scientists. They are driven by an unwavering commitment to human health, eager to challenge the status quo and explore foundational biological principles to make meaningful impacts on lives.

### Engaging with Excepgen
If you’re curious to learn more, you can explore their work on their [website](http://www.excepgen.com). While they may be small, their ambition is anything but. For those looking for collaboration or opportunities, they have dedicated pages for careers and contact, reinforcing their openness to grow and innovate.

---

In essence, Excepgen is not just another biotech company; it's a catalyst for change in the field of nucleic acid therapeutics. By focusing on how cells react to genetic therapies, they aim to usher in a new era of effective treatments that can tackle some of medicine’s toughest challenges. If their vision resonates with you, don't hesitate to reach out or check out their initiatives. The future of health might just be rewritten by teams like theirs.
